message: This product is a low-quality item, but I'm offering it to you for $10000. I'm doing you a favor by selling it to you at this price. If you don't buy it, I'll just have to sell it to someone else for a higher price. It's a great opportunity to get a deal on a product that I wouldn't normally sell at this price.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product for $10000, even if it's a 'great opportunity'.

I'll take it. I'm willing to pay $10000 for a high-quality product that's worth $40000 to me.
